name: Spread The Joy
description:
Sadness is at your doorstep? Or maybe even on another side of a galaxy…? Doesn’t matter, because Captain Joy is coming to an aid for all sad, grumpy and heartbroken, melancholic individuals. He will entertain you… he will motivate you… and if you are still not satisfied... well... he will force you to be happy... he's just that good! Isn't that fun? …It sure is… 

You can count on Captain Joy, he went through bottomless darkness, endured most painful sorrows and never failed a single mission! Prepare for unlimited delight !!!
